ðŸ“– Summary: The Dolphin repository provides code and pre-trained models for document image parsing. It uses a novel multimodal approach called Heterogeneous Anchor Prompting to analyze and parse document images, extracting elements like text, figures, and tables in a structured manner. The model operates in two stages: layout analysis and parallel element parsing.
